author: Dr15Jones
body:
#### PR description:

- removed all uses of the Service ConstProductRegistry
- switched to explicitly using SignallingProductRegistry when building modules
- added interfaces to OccurenceForOutput to allow access to the ProductRegistry appropriate for the transition

#### PR validation:

Code compiles and framework unit tests pass.

resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1174 https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1180
title: Remove uses of ConstProductRegistry from framework
